title: Rememento - White Shadow
subTitle: Role Playing/Turn-based RPG
desc:
Step into a whole new level of strategy with 『Rememento - White Shadow』.
Download now and begin your legendary journey!
■ An Epic Story That Pulls You In
Defy the witches’ curse and unveil the truth behind the gods’ forgotten memories.
In the chaos of creation, shape your destiny and uncover what lies beyond the veil.
■ Smart, Satisfying Turn-Based Combat
Master the flow of battle with a streamlined MP-based system.
With every decision, manage your energy, time your skills, and outplay your enemies — easy to pick up, endlessly deep to master.
■ Cinematic Cutscenes & Stunning Unreal Graphics
Every chapter bursts to life with fully animated 3D cinematics.
Enjoy immersive visuals powered by Unreal Engine and a story told through rich, expressive animation.
■ PvP That Rewards Tactical Brilliance
Outsmart rivals in fierce real-time PvP with ever-evolving strategies.
Climb the ranks each season by adapting your tactics and proving your skill.
Rewrite fate sealed in divine memory. Illuminate the final dawn.
Download Rememento - White Shadow and begin your legendary journey now.
